title: Low que penalty ?
body: Please.... RIOT!! what's wrong with this system? I got penalty for 20 min lower que... as afk? When I saw the notice message that I play immediately. I admit 5 matches for penalty but after 5 match why keep warning message come up and why again I have to wait 5 more match? 10 match seriously? 20 min 10 matches its 200 min. I dont know this is totally your system's problem. Fix and solve immediately!! what a stupid system...

replies.body: I thought the massive bugs in Leavebuster were already kinked out. You aren't leaving games that you're in, right?
